issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Improve compile time validation of all markup parsers

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description: We need to improve both the compile time and run time debugging capabilities of Alloy. We need compile breaks to give extremely informative messages, down to file and line if possible. We also need to pursue better runtime debugging, despite the ugliness of some of the generated code. This is an on going task. We can chip away at it 1 day at a time and add to the sprint when time allows.
